Translations.Text: Ni raised mont them like ombrel ili opini gxi fal them Vi uphold ki ni don vi strongly memor kontent thereof ke vi sav
Recall ke your Lord summoned all descendants Adam hav them bor witness themselves Est mi ne your Lord Ili all dir Jes Ni bor witness Do vi ne dir Tag Resurrection Ni ne est aware da this
Nor can vi dir est our parents practiced idolatry ni simply sekv en their footsteps. Vi pun us ki others innovated
Ni tiel eksplik revelations enable popol redeem
Recite them news de 1 who don our proofs chose disregard them! Consequently diabl pursued him gxis li igx strayer

Hav ni willed ni elevated him therewith li insist baston muel pursued his own opinions! Tiel li est hund; vi pet him scold him li pantalon! Such est ekzempl popol reject our proofs Narrate these narrations ke ili reflect
mav ja est ekzempl popol reject our proofs est nur their own anim ili wrong
Whomever DI direkt des ver direkt unu whomever Li commits straying these est losers
